task: Develop a basic 'Asteroids' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Use an old idea'.
name: Meteor Blitz

branding_data.short_description: Meteor Blitz is a modern twist on the classic 'Asteroids' arcade game, incorporating nostalgic gameplay with innovative mechanics.
branding_data.detailed_description: Meteor Blitz takes inspiration from the iconic 'Asteroids' game, blending retro arcade elements with fresh strategies to create an engaging space shooter experience. Players pilot a nimble spacecraft tasked with obliterating incoming meteors while dodging debris in a vibrant cosmic environment. The game introduces power-ups and special abilities, adding layers of strategy and excitement to the traditional asteroid-dodging mechanics. The familiar yet fresh gameplay invites both veterans of the genre and newcomers to enjoy the thrill of cosmic battles.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
